name: 30-days-of-javascript-challenge
description: *Welcome to the [30 Days Of JavaScript ](https://courses.chaicode.com/learn/batch/30-days-of-Javascript-challenge), hosted by [Hitesh Choudhary](https://www.linkedin.com/in/hiteshchoudhary/) Founder of [ChaiAurCode](https://courses.chaicode.com/learn). This challenge aims to transform your JavaScript skills by covering core subjects, related questions, data structures and algorithms (DSA), and hands-on project creation.*
